sqlMap.select: SELECT YEAR ,SUBSTR(INSP_PLAN_DATE,5,2) AS MON ,DEPT_CD ,PERM_TC ,IMP_GUBUN ,CO_NM ,INSP_NM ,INSP_PLAN_DATE ,REAL_INSP_DATE FROM V_GHF0301M_001 WHERE 1= 1 AND YEAR = #findYear# AND SUBSTR(INSP_PLAN_DATE,5,2) = #findMon# AND DEPT_CD = #findDeptId# ORDER BY YEAR, MON, DEPT_CD

SELECT A.YEAR , A.ITEM_CD , A.ITEM_NM , A.ITEM_ACTUAL_DIVI , A.ITEM_DIVI , A.SYSTEM_GBN , A.CONTENT , A.EXCEL_USER_ID , A.DEPT_APPLY_SCOPE , B.USER_NM AS EXCEL_USER_NM , CASE WHEN A.DELETE_DT IS NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END USE_YN FROM BSC_SYSTEM_ITEM A LEFT OUTER JOIN V_ROLE_USER B ON A.EXCEL_USER_ID = B.USER_ID WHERE A.YEAR = #year# AND A.ITEM_CD = #itemCd#

SELECT A.DEPT_ID , A.DEPT_NM || '(' || A.UP_DEPT_NM || ')' AS DEPT_NM FROM BSC_DEPTINFO A INNER JOIN V_GHF0301M_001 B ON A.DEPT_ID = B.DEPT_CD WHERE 1=1 AND YEAR = #findYear# AND SUBSTR(INSP_PLAN_DATE, 5, 2) = #findMon# GROUP BY DEPT_NM, DEPT_ID, UP_DEPT_NM ORDER BY DEPT_NM ASC

, SYSDATE

)
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE BSC_SYSTEM_ITEM SET ITEM_NM = #itemNm# , ITEM_ACTUAL_DIVI = #itemActualDivi# , ITEM_DIVI = #itemDivi# , SYSTEM_GBN = #systemGbn# , CONTENT = #content# , EXCEL_USER_ID = #excelUserId# , DEPT_APPLY_SCOPE = #deptApplyScope# , MODIFY_DT = SYSDATE
, DELETE_DT = SYSDATE
, DELETE_DT = NULL
WHERE YEAR = #year# AND ITEM_CD = #itemCd#
UPDATE BSC_SYSTEM_ITEM SET DELETE_DT = SYSDATE WHERE 1 = 1 AND YEAR = #year# AND ITEM_CD = #itemCd#
sqlMap.select: SELECT ITEM_NM FROM BSC_SYSTEM_ITEM WHERE YEAR = #findYear# AND ITEM_CD = #findItemCd#

SELECT A.YEAR , C.SC_DEPT_ID , D.SC_DEPT_NM , A.METRIC_ID , C.METRIC_NM , A.CAL_TYPE_COL , A.CAL_TYPE_COL_NM , B.ITEM_CD , B.ITEM_NM FROM BSC_CAL_TYPE_COL A INNER JOIN BSC_SYSTEM_ITEM B ON A.YEAR = B.YEAR AND A.ITEM_CD = B.ITEM_CD AND B.DELETE_DT IS NULL INNER JOIN BSC_METRIC C ON A.YEAR = C.YEAR AND A.METRIC_ID = C.METRIC_ID AND C.DELETE_DT IS NULL INNER JOIN BSC_SC_DEPT D ON C.YEAR = D.YEAR AND C.SC_DEPT_ID = D.SC_DEPT_ID AND D.DELETE_DT IS NULL WHERE A.YEAR = #findYear# AND A.ITEM_CD = #findItemCd# AND A.DELETE_DT IS NULL AND A.ITEM_CD IS NOT NULL ORDER BY A.METRIC_ID, A.CAL_TYPE_COL
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM BSC_ADMIN WHERE ADMIN_GUBUN IN ('20')
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO BSC_ADMIN (ADMIN_GUBUN, USER_ID, DEPT_ID) SELECT DISTINCT '20' , A.EXCEL_USER_ID , (SELECT MAX(DEPT_ID) AS DEPT_ID FROM V_ROLE_USER WHERE USER_ID = A.EXCEL_USER_ID) FROM BSC_SYSTEM_ITEM A WHERE A.DELETE_DT IS NULL AND A.EXCEL_USER_ID IS NOT NULL
